pages.text: The $(mob)Incinerator$() is a monster that attacks players on sight by launching fireball attacks at ranged similar to a $(l:minecraft_blaze)$(mob)Blaze$(), dealing fire damage and lighting its target on fire. When reduced to 75% health or lower, an $(mob)Incinerator$() will switch to melee combat, retaining its ability to light its target on fire. It is immune to Fire.
$(mob)Incinerators$() drop $(item)Gold Nuggets$() on death, which can be combined to make $(item)Gold Ingots$().
